% page 1

\begin{tikzpicture}
  \begin{scope}[every node/.style={block2}]
    \node[%
          my node,
          minimum height=3\smallestHeight,
          minimum width=4\smallestWidth,
          align=center
    ]
          (audio)
          {语音};

    \node[%
          my node,
          minimum height=3\smallestHeight,
          minimum width=4\smallestWidth,
          right=of audio,
          anchor=west,
          align=center
    ]
        at ($(audio.east)+(1.5\nodeDistance, 0)$)
          (feat)
          {提取特征};

    \node[%
          my node,
          minimum height=3\smallestHeight,
          minimum width=4\smallestWidth,
          right=of feat,
          anchor=west,
          align=center,
    ]
        at ($(feat.east)+(1.5\nodeDistance, 0)$)
          (nn)
          {神经网络模型};

    \node[%
          my node,
          minimum height=3\smallestHeight,
          minimum width=4\smallestWidth,
          right=of nn,
          anchor=west,
          align=center,
    ]
        at ($(nn.east)+(1.5\nodeDistance, 0)$)
          (post)
          {后处理};

    \node[%
          my node,
          minimum height=3\smallestHeight,
          minimum width=4\smallestWidth,
          right=of post,
          anchor=west,
          align=center,
    ]
        at ($(post.east)+(1.5\nodeDistance, 0)$)
          (text)
          {文字};

   \draw[my line, my arrow] (audio) -- (feat);
   \draw[my line, my arrow] (feat) -- (nn);
   \draw[my line, my arrow] (nn) -- (post);
   \draw[my line, my arrow] (post) -- (text);
   % \draw[my line, my arrow] (loss) |- (opt);
   % \draw[my line, my arrow] (opt) -- (nn);
   % \draw[my line, my arrow]
   %    ($(data.west) + (-3\nodeDistance, 0)$)
   %      --
   %      node[above, midway, draw=none, my node text]{cegs.$*$.ark}
   %    (data);
  \end{scope}
\end{tikzpicture}

    \node[%
